Articles.Content:
So, I'm having a problem related to using the grabbing unit on asteroids. The problem is that while I'm 'docked', the asteroid begins to spin, even after I use time warp. It just starts spinning again, going faster and faster. Has anybody seen something like this before, or can anybody help? I'd like to continue setting up my base as soon as possible.

Edited May 10, 2015 by Cimroa

Hi Cimroa, to help diagnose this we'll need your KSP.log and player.log from after this issue occurs, we'll also need your save file and if you can record the event that'd help too.

Please see the sticked support threads for more info.
I just checked in on the craft, and after relogging, it seems to have fixed itself.
